Wither Core: Chance (1/50) of being dropped by The Wither.
Ender Core: Chance (1/25) of being dropped by The Ender Dragon.
Black Onyx: Chance (1/15) of being dropped by a charged Creeper.
Hellfire: Dropped by Nether Mobs. Combine 9 in a Crafting Table to reach next tier. Goes up to Tier 5.
Chunk of Sculk: Common Chance of being dropped by The Warden.
Warden Core: Chance (1/100) of being dropped by The Warden.
Fiery Sentinel Core: Chance (1/25) of being dropped by a Fiery Sentinel.
Zombie Heart: Chance (1/10) of being dropped by a Zombie Enforcer.
Foul Flesh: Chance of being dropped by a Zombie Enforcer.
Tarantula Silk: Chance (1/10) of being dropped by a Tarantula.
Prismarine Fragment: Chance (1/3) of being dropped by a Guardian.
Gilded Prismarine Artifact: Chance (1/25) of being dropped by an Elder Guardian, Grants immunity to all negative potion effects.
Stellar Fragment: Chance (1/5) of being dropped by the Cosmic Guardian.
Gemstone (Tiered): Rarely Found when using a mining drill below Y=0. (40% Ruby, 15% Sapphire, Amethyst, Peridot, 10% Apatite, 5% Topaz)
Soul of the Revenant: Chance (1/50) of being dropped by a Revenant Zombie.
Staff of Punishment: Creates a short-ranged beam that debuffs the first enemy it hits.
Staff of Enlightenment: Creates a short-ranged beam that sets the first enemy it hits on fire.
Staff of Lightning: Makes lightning strike the targeted block.
Thunderstorm Staff: Makes lots of lightning bolts strike the targeted block.
Simple Staff of Necromancy: Spawns 5 Zombies near the targeted block.
Advanced Staff of Necromancy: Spawns 5 Wither Skeletons near the targeted block
Whirlwind Bow: Shoots three arrows in quick succession.
Advanced Relocator: Teleports You 12 Blocks forward. Teleports up to 50 Blocks onto a targeted block while sneaking.
Hyperion: Teleports you 10 Blocks forward, explodes and deals 8 Hearts (16) damage to all surrounding enemies. Grants Absorption and Regeneration for 5 Seconds.
Book of Forgotten Knowledge: Increases the Mana Cap by 100 while held in Offhand.
Delicate Hoe: Harvests only grown crops and replants automatically.
Juju Shortbow: Shoots instantly. Flame and Punch enchantments are disabled.
Dowsing Rod: Finds nearby ores of a specific type. Limited to overworld ores.
Wand of Healing: Grants you Regeneration for a short while.
Sword of Truth: Deals an extra heart of true damage.
Ritual Blade: Spawns a Revenant Zombie when killing a regular one.
Wand of Mending: Grants you Regeneration for a short while.
Spectral Shield: Grants five seconds of invincibility, has a very long cooldown.
Staff of Restoration: Heals Players in a small circle
Frozen Scythe: Shoots an ice bolt that slows everything in its path.
Grand Experience Bottle: Gives you more XP when thrown.
God Potion: Gives you lots of positive effects for one hour.
Fiery Sentinel Head: Used to summon the Fiery Sentinel by hitting an Iron Golem.
Tactical Exfiltration: Keep this item in inventory. Will be consumed on death, but your inventory and XP will stay with you.
Biofuel: Drag and Drop onto a drill for +500 fuel.
Cloudwalker Boots: Go Fast, Jump high! Cancels all Fall Damage.
Divers Mask: Hello, how are you? I am under da watur, please help me!
Scholars Hood: Multiplies your base mana by two.
Sorcerers Hood: Multiplies your base mana by three.
Grandmasters Hood: Multiplies your base mana by four.
Iron Warden Helmet: Grants you five extra hearts of health, but slows you down.
Golden Warden Helmet: Grants you ten extra healts of health, but slows you down.
Gladiators Helmet: Grants you some extra Attack Damage, but prevents Regeneration.
Shadow Samurai Helmet: Gives decent Attack Damage and Movement Speed.
Hellfire Helmet: Good Helmet that also grants great attack damage and fire resistance. Tiered.
Burststopper Chestplate: Prevents you from taking more than 4 Hearts of damage at once.
Dark Helmet: Grants Extra Attach Damage and Movement Speed.
Dark Armor Chestplate: Grants Extra Attach Damage and Movement Speed.
Dark Armor Pants: Grants Extra Attach Damage and Movement Speed.
Dark Armor Shoes: Grants Extra Attach Damage and Movement Speed.
Miners Helmet: Grants Haste 3 when full set is worn.
Miners Armor Chestplate: Grants Haste 3 when full set is worn.
Miners Armor Pants: Grants Haste 3 when full set is worn.
Miners Armor Shoes: Grants Haste 3 when full set is worn.
Blaze Helmet: Sneaking lights surrounding enemies on fire for a short while.
Blaze Armor Chestplate: Sneaking lights surrounding enemies on fire for a short while.
Blaze Armor Pants: Sneaking lights surrounding enemies on fire for a short while.
Blaze Armor Shoes: Sneaking lights surrounding enemies on fire for a short while.
Frozen Blaze Helmet: Provides Fire Immunity. Slows down and damages surrounding enemies while sneaking.
Frozen Blaze Armor Chestplate: Provides Fire Immunity. Slows down and damages surrounding enemies while sneaking.
Frozen Blaze Armor Pants: Provides Fire Immunity. Slows down and damages surrounding enemies while sneaking.
Frozen Blaze Armor Shoes: Provides Fire Immunity. Slows down and damages surrounding enemies while sneaking.
Guardian Helmet: Grants +75 Mana per piece, grants 1 Mana Regen per 2 Pieces.
Guardian Armor Chestplate: Grants +75 Mana per piece, grants 1 Mana Regen per 2 Pieces.
Guardian Armor Pants: Grants +75 Mana per piece, grants 1 Mana Regen per 2 Pieces.
Guardian Armor Shoes: Grants +75 Mana per piece, grants 1 Mana Regen per 2 Pieces.
